title: Tom Wolfe: "I Am Charlotte Simmons"
description: Michael's conversation from 2004 with author Tom Wolfe, on his then new book "I Am Charlotte Simmons: A Novel." The book was published on 9 November 2004.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Tom Wolfe)
